identity.name: Investyz

buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-6 text-base font-medium border-2 border-primary/20 hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors

sections: Hero: Split screen or centered with 'Solarpunk' city background. Headline: 'Invest in the Infrastructure of Tomorrow'. CTA: 'Start Investing' + 'View Segments'.
Features Grid: Bento grid layout highlighting 'Daily Payouts', 'Real Asset Backing', 'Carbon Negative'. Use large icons/numbers.
Segments Carousel: Interactive cards for Data Centers, Batteries, etc. Hover effects reveal APY.
How it Works: 3-step process (Connect Wallet -> Choose Plan -> Earn).
Trust/Partners: Marquee of eco-partners and blockchain logos.

dashboard.layout: Sidebar navigation (left) + Top bar (Wallet Connect, User Profile). Main content area with 'Control Room' grid.
widgets: Portfolio Value (Big number, green trend line)
Impact Metrics (CO2 offset, kWh generated - CRITICAL for this brand)

investment_detail.layout: Two-column. Left: Asset imagery + Key Stats (APY, Lock Period). Right: Investment Calculator + 'Invest Now' card.
features: Calculator: Slider for investment amount -> shows projected daily/monthly/yearly returns.
Risk Meter: Visual gauge showing risk level (Low/Medium/High).

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use noise/grain textures overlays for depth.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (scale up, brightness up).
For charts, use 'recharts' via shadcn/ui chart component.
Dark mode is preferred for the Dashboard, Light mode for Landing Page (or support both with toggle).
